website_summaries.verdict: Plenty of offerings in a tiny camera, including slo-mo and 4K 60FPS video.
pros: Voice commands make hands-free use easy

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace camera on a drone. Fantastic wide angle shots, stable and high quality images. Setting up was a nightmare and the app is badly designed, confusing and poorly laid out and hard to find things. But the images are what it’s all about and cannot fault it for output. Battery life is excellent too.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Best action camera out to date
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had all the top range action cameras including YI 4K plus and go pro 7 black and this osmo is by far the best so far. First thing you will notice is the build quality is solid and feels welll made, the touch screen responds flawlessly and is nice and bright, front screen is not touchscreen but it’s very useful, battery life is very good and there are many accessories you can buy like filters and mounts. Image quality is fantastic and smooth, HDR works very well in low lit conditions, I can’t think of any cons about this so if your looking for the best action camera on the market 2019 this is it. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jmax

customer_reviews.title: It works very well and was very simple to set up
customer_reviews.text: good online instructions and excellent touchscreen amazing for the money. you need a good fast computer to use the files though and this side of things was more difficult to get used to. worth the effort though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 24hrs.
customer_reviews.text: my camera has stopped working after a day use. END OF STORY. I only managed to use it for one DAY! and now i am abroad, and angry and i wont be back home untill next year to replace this item or anything; so stuck a item that doens't work for the rest of my trip! USELESS!
customer_reviews.author: Rohit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my GoPro this is so much better. Stabilisation is aamzing
customer_reviews.author: J S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok, mine just had a battery issue.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the build quality is excellent, rugged and looks like it would withstand the odd knock / rough handling. Unfortunately mine had an issue with the battery, even though the unit was fully charged it would periodically report low battery and power itself off, on restart it would state a good battery and run as normal for a few minutes and then I’d get the error again :-( Rinse & repeat. The video recordings were pretty good although not on par with the Osmo Pocket. I was also not that impressed with the ‘Rock Steady’ feature... again it’s not as good as the mechanical gimbal on the Osmo Pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Full satisfied and happy buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly i wrote old reciews with bad experiance because i faced difficult in activation camera using iphone xs but after too much trails i got sucess activation..now i use it for 3 days and very happy with camera and take photos to my son all day..thank you Dji Osmo Action
customer_reviews.author: Hazem Sofi

customer_reviews.title: Latest update is a must, but other than that, why pay for a Gopro???
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant little camera. I have a Hero Session and a Hero 4, which I still use, but this is way better. The image stabilisation is a game changer from the gimbal I normally use mountain biking. The battery life is a lot better than the Hero 4, even shooting in 4k. The latest update has improved the screen functions and I'm told it's arguably better than the Hero 8 in terms of interface. I would definitley recommend this camera, expecially given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Newman

customer_reviews.title: Comme ci Comme ca
customer_reviews.text: Has an excellent video quality, but it lacks in the photos quality. There is no zoom and all the pictures look like if you are a lot of meters away, even the selfies looks like you are faaaar away. Easy to use, but the battery is not good. e.g. normal use for picture for 1 hour and it decrease by 50%, so if you want to take a video for 1 hour probably it will drain out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for vlog creators
customer_reviews.text: Returned, camera starts focusing from around 50cm, definitely not for doing blog videos as your face is not sharp, just the background Also plenty of noise even with low iso and good light Compression artifacts when using EIS
customer_reviews.author: snc

customer_reviews.title: That I can actually use the thing rather than use it as a paperweight
customer_reviews.text: Dear Amazon, I'd love to be able to use my new DJI Osmo Action however the MSD card I ordered at the same time is apparently in transit and has been for well in excess of a week now. Why is it taking so long, is it being hand delivered or is the wafer stuck in the foundary? Appreciate the situation with C-19 but everything else has been delivered in reasonable time. Until the card arrives I cannot really put this to the test, I inserted my 'old tech' card out of my tablet but the write speed isn't up to it.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Osmo Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the Osmo I love, not quite found how or if there is zoom yet and the battery does go down pretty quick, but after using it a few times the battery doesn't drain so much.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say about this camera it was the toss between this for a go pro 7 read lots of views watched lots of videos on this camera. I can truly say this is an amazing piece of kit. Very easy to set up and use camera quality is amazing and I'm loving the video quality loved in my time-lapse videosand will be using this when I do my diving
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but not as good as my GoPro 7 black, fov is a lot smaller on the osmo and for anyone thinking of this for freestyle fpv will be disappointed as the Camra doesn’t seem to keep up with the high speeds and you get a blocky picture but for general use as a 4K compact camera it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bowkett

customer_reviews.title: Really nice ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I wasn’t sure if i should get a GoPro or this one, but in terms of money it has almost the same prospects (for a non professional camera user) for a smaller price. Love the front screen and I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anca Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Airplane wing video
customer_reviews.text: 4k/30 with stabilization, that's the mode of this camera. I wish to be able to attach an extra battery easily to the form factor, to extend the recording time.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: great little action camera
customer_reviews.text: loving the quality of this camera, rock steady function is very impressive the only little issue is no blue tooth remotes work with this camera which I assumed it would. film quality is very good though
customer_reviews.author: Dan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best small camera ever, I found it to be better than a GoPro. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Best small camera ever, I found it to be better than a GoPro. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Ioannmans

customer_reviews.title: Osmo good  or bad
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad touch screen hit and miss the slow motion is ace 4k is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is THE camera to buy
customer_reviews.text: Not completely satisfied with colours but may sort with filter. Other than that superb
customer_reviews.author: Ken park

customer_reviews.title: Build quality
customer_reviews.text: First can I say, this came very quick indeed. The build quality is first class.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Video recording flickering. This happens on very cheap action cameras. Action cameras on this bracket price should perform better. I will see the replacement if does work right.
customer_reviews.author: lucian

customer_reviews.title: Lovely little toy
customer_reviews.text: Great for holiday photos in and out of the pool and sea. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Super little camera
customer_reviews.text: more features easy to use and great pictures and video
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Mandatory mobile phone activation required
customer_reviews.text: Zero points for mandatory mobile phone activation through manufacture app - returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: ...Big Goodies In A Little Box!
customer_reviews.text: ...I read all the reviews, the comparisons with the GoPro-8, watched a ton of videos...then ordered this. It arrived ontime and well-packed...so well it was tough to get outta the box! LOL!....But have been testing it out in various conditions...and it has shined so far with everything I threw at it. Easy to use, video-quality is Escellent...and the image-stabilization is Amazing! ...Also, the dewarp function works very nicely to remove the dreaded fisheye look. Seriously consider this if you are in the market for an action-cam!
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: Seller ripped me off.
customer_reviews.text: Received a broken product (screen didn't work right) and then during the return the buyer stole my money and the item.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Osmo for Me
customer_reviews.text: I am a DJI fanboy admittedly and I picked this camera over the Go Pro based on some bias towards DJI products. I use this camera mainly for outdoors to capture drone flights and other travel adventures. I like the front facing screen and the easy to use instructions. All of the settings are easy to set and filming is effortless.
customer_reviews.author: DaddyMac

customer_reviews.title: Image quality is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I like everything else about this camera. The stabilization is pretty amazing. The audio in while inside the cage is LOW, I haven't tried it outside of the cage yet. The Image at 4K looks like a cheap camcorder toy from 10 years ago. On a bright day, with the ISO set to 100, d-cinelike , dewarp off, MOV format, the video looks cheap and muddy. I think if there were an option for a higher bit rate that might fix it, maybe. Im very unhappy with the image quality, its what a $20 camera should look like, NOT one at $280.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging battery. Now completely dead
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 batteries which charges through external charger with no problem, but Osmo itself cannot charge any of these batteries anymore. Charging light is glowing/pulsing and battery charge stuck at 48%. Now it is completely dead. Lost the whole card (256 GB) of data. Does not turn ON anymore. Card is unreadable and unrecoverable. Osmo is a junk.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Vorkunov

customer_reviews.title: Dual screen failed within one week, poor video quality.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the worst I have ever used. The selfie screen failed within one week of mild use. The video quality is extremely poor and there is noise everywhere especially in low light conditions. You can have the greatest features (4k,stabilisation, dual screens etc.) in the world but if the quality of the footage you are capturing is poor, and there is noise everywhere then it defeats the entire purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Dhrupatee Soogrim

customer_reviews.title: product did not meet the manufacturers claim "water proof"
customer_reviews.text: we were snorkeling 8 - 10 feet of water camera battery ran down quickly. the camera would not turn back on after 1st use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Battery is very bad
customer_reviews.text: I got the Osmo action camera this week. I start to use the first time it is good but I use the second time it is always turn off when I try to turn on it is not working. After I decided to take out the battery and pull in again it is turn on. then I try to turn off and then turn on it is still not works. It was a bad situation my friend's beautiful hike time. Also, it has many sound problems.
customer_reviews.author: Muugii

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars for the connection hassle.  4 stars for the camera
customer_reviews.text: The pictures and video quality is great. The battery life could be longer but I guess it's about average for any action camera. I never would have purchased the Osmo Action if I had known the connection to the cell phones app would be such a hassle. Its hit and miss and has not been worth my effort to put my activity on hold just to connect to my phone. I have a couple of days left to decide if I want to return it and get a GoPro. 2 stars for the connection hassle. 4 stars for the camera.
customer_reviews.author: DWell

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the reviews on YouTube about this camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this a few days ago and updated the firmware. Still a significant lag time between what you doing and what you see in the camera monitor/view screen. Also, the camera view screen goes out after about two minutes of filming so it's useless. Going to try and send this junk back and get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: M.D. Creekmore

customer_reviews.title: Screen burn-in after a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: Today I noticed some burn-in on the screen and I've only been using this unit for about a month. Probably don't leave your unit plugged in to a computer over night like I did. The "Computer connected" view stays on when connected.
customer_reviews.author: Zodiase

customer_reviews.title: Looking good so far, but we'll see.....
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera for now, and since I had a great time at the pool today recording my nieces, I intend to give it a little more time and see how that works out. I'm going to try a few more times and if it keeps going well, I will update this review. Seeing as how I only got the camera a couple days ago, I am not sure what to say yet. However, I will give you an update in the future if it will keep the five star rating, or lose a star or 2. We'll see.....
customer_reviews.author: Saenar Drift

customer_reviews.title: Great  camera!
customer_reviews.text: It's just amazing! Front screen, fast power on, great specs, nice image, flat color profile, bunch of shooting modes, this one has it all. I see no reason why you would not want to buy this if you're thinking about action camera. And to be honest, I bought it mostly for filming just regular stuff, not specifically action. It fulfilled my every need I had for a camera, just 0 regrets buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Constantine

customer_reviews.title: So Far - Very Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Edit: Gets very hot, very quickly in use and easily overheard outside - sometimes when it’s not in the sun or for very long. When low on batteries I’ve seen the last 5-10minutes of a recording file be corrupted with horizontal purple lines almost like vcr heads going bad. In addition, this camera records video files in apx 30 minutes sections if you record longer than 30 minutes and it can be kind of annoying editing in a timeline. Enjoying the front facing camera, stabilized video, usbc connectivity and the ability to connect an external mic. Will possibly do a video review on my youtube channel Peace, Love and Guns.
customer_reviews.author: Peace, Love and Guns

customer_reviews.title: Look out GOPRO
customer_reviews.text: Go Pro has a legit challenger. My first use the color was off then I updated the firmware and I like it better than my GO PRO 8. I think its easier to use and the screen in the front really helps when doing selfies or aiming the camera from the front. I have since purchased a second and debating a third to completely replace my GO PROs. Also the video is easier to upload to my editor I use than the Go PRo videos, not sure why but it does. The picture seems to be more steady when walking or running and for the hockey rink it has been hit twice with no noticeable damage and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: better video than camera
customer_reviews.text: this is my first time using an action camera so take my input with a grain of salt. it definitely does not come from a deep background of experiences. The video seems great. The image stabilization was nice. there is a pretty significant display delay when the stabilization is on so what you're seeing on the screen is close to a full second behind what the lens is actually seeing. this makes handheld shots a little tricky. The photo quality is quite a bit lower than the video quality for some reason. i haven't figured out if i can rectify that or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: The 4k @ 60fps had me, plus the Rock Steady is a Gimbal Killer! You have the choice to remove the lens and place an ND filter for bright days. Go out and make memories with a camera that can keeps up with you! Originally I come from GoPro Hero 2 way way back. The lack of support for what the community wants in a action camera have long been ignored by GoPro. DJI stepped in and changed that game and now is in the lead.
customer_reviews.author: SoloMeek

customer_reviews.title: Beats GoPro
customer_reviews.text: This is a better camera than GoPro, not just a contender but easily a better camera. The user interface beat GoPro by itself. The large viewer screen is better. The dual screen is better and everything else is just as good or better than the GoPro. This is the camera you want, features are awesome! I researched and researched and am very please with the OSMO Action.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Simply didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Darn, I must have bought a lemon. Half the time I record things, can view them on the device but they won’t show up when I try to transfer to my computer, iPhone or iPad. Terribly frustrating! I’m going to have to spend the $$$ and get a gopro9. I simply can’t deal with the frustration to save a few $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Blueman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture quality, easy to use menus, water proof!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really super nice, we use it all the time, although the voice command system is rinky-dink gimmicky, isn’t reliable, would have been better they didn’t even try to include it. Other than that, five stars! Takes amazing under water pictures with no need for waterproof case! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lan T.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera
customer_reviews.text: That you can replace the lens by unscrewing it and the front facing screen really sold me over the GoPro. I use it for so many different scenarios it's awesome. The sound is pretty good too. I often use just this camera to film my videos for YouTube, with no external mic. Very pleased with this camera.
customer_reviews.author: warren

customer_reviews.title: Rocksteady really works! And love the selfies screen
customer_reviews.text: Have Had a few experiences with DJI products before, and this one feels right at home with their drones and gimbal. The rocksteady really works wonder and the footage looks incredible right out of the box. The extra front screen really help make it a lot easier to compose the selfies. The only action cam that may offer similar function to the second screen would be the Sony RX0.
customer_reviews.author: Buttermilk

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the image and stabilization
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for over 2 months now and works great. Was a bit hesitant to switch from GoPro to osmo but figure since the drones are pretty good, why not. I’ve got no complains, stabilization and image clarity are great. Just wish it worked with some of the mic adapters out there, looks like we might have to wait for DJI to release one to work with the osmo actio .
customer_reviews.author: Ed Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Beyond impressed and happy filming
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if ima touch my go pro 7 again. Naw I will but this is now my main camera when I film. I love the front facing screen, the quality of filming. The way it catches sound, voice activation. I didn’t think go pro would have a competitor but here it is. DJI has made a another amazing product, and I honestly am thinking about buying more to replace my gopros.
customer_reviews.author: Tru

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye Go Pro
customer_reviews.text: I've had GoPros since the original that came out years ago and let me tell you...after spending the first 10min with my DJI Osmo Action I was upset with myself that I didn't switch sooner. -My last GoPro was the 7 Silver with the latest iPhone app. The DJI is better in nearly every way. The video and photos are better quality, the software is great, the camera is easier to use...I will soon be buying a drone too.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: You are going to love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I was ready to buy a go pro and then I saw this. You get a front display, it's cheaper and other things better than a go pro. I have an old go pro and that is why I was just going to go for another go pro but I am glad I didn't. This camera takes excellent video, very happy with it and you can use voice command too, that is nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: -A

customer_reviews.title: Flip screen flip screen flip screen
customer_reviews.text: Cameras great and the stabilization is great. I like DJI products a lot but with voice control when you say “flip screen" you have to say it 20x while jumping up and down On one leg while facing the camera north. Have you ever tried to say flip screen multiple times in a row. Go on try it now flip screen flip screen flip screen. Wasn’t easy was it!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Must have for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera ONE day before flying out to the Big Island and this was the only place, selling the camera without accessories (saving 100+ dollars), that delivered so quickly. The camera was just perfect for snorkeling. It even recorded a sea turtle that I didn’t notice when snorkeling. I love this camera!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I’ve wrecked with it three times now while riding my MTB. Once while it was attached to helmet and twice with on handlebars. Still works perfectly. Battery live is about 40 minutes. Pretty stable video with Rocksteady on. Most GoPro attachment work with it. It also take pretty nice pictures and videos underwater.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Better then GoPro
customer_reviews.text: I switched over from using GoPro’s and this camera is way better. I was tired of having constant issues with battery and camera freezing on the GoPro. No issues so far with this.
customer_reviews.author: Colin W.

customer_reviews.title: GoPro killer!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best action cam I've ever used! I am totally in love with it! It's so easy to use, rocksteady does exactly what it's supposed to makes my videos look like I shot them on a gimbal. The front screen makes framing so easy and the phone app just connects and works. I'm so glad I went with this camera instead of another GoPro!!!
customer_reviews.author: K. martin

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I expected. No set up instructions with it. No hand handle to hold up camera while walking. Need to buy additional things for camera. Didn't bother start usage. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Super easy interface. 4 stars because it is missing a way to input external audio from a mic.
customer_reviews.text: The camera allows for easy to access preset with the button on the side. This way you can get into and out of setting in a snap, unlike other cameras where you have to dig deep and change one setting at a time. There is now way to connect a mic that is the reason I remove 1 star. I know it can be done because gopro can do this.
customer_reviews.author: Lalo Flores

customer_reviews.title: Can only record 30mins at a time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my old gopro. Not pleased when startup screen indicated the camera requires registration to use. Recordings are limited to 30 minutes, requiring you to press the record button to start another. Useless for the 90 minute remote recording session I intended to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: FMcB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this camera !
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the GoPro 8 to do some YouTube videos, but I found it dated and full of flaws. Always been a great fan of DJI and they nailed it ! Great battery life, great picture, and has access to all the GoPro accessories !! Which is brilliant Highly recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: my best action camara ever
customer_reviews.text: i order the osmo acition camara over the go pro 8 because of the front screen and the perfect voice comand that it has...i love it. the pictures and videos look way beter on these action camara then on my smart phone when i put it side to side i just love it...its perfect for all my out door adventures😎
customer_reviews.author: Sieya Sina

customer_reviews.title: DJI
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, high-definition, battery life is good, double screen good, ￼ but there's only one place I'm not satisfied with, still need to improve image stabilization technology, intense sport camera does not use ￼ ￼
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Liu

customer_reviews.title: Action camera you wish to have
customer_reviews.text: This product from DJI is fantastic. You will find it doing really good with the stabilisation, 4k, of course front screen helps you to film better while skiing or riding mountain bike. Osmo Action doese really well under the water. Its really grate at experience to work and have fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amiran Pavliashvili

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It’s built much better than my Gopro. If it continues to work like it does now. It blows Gopro away Great camera. Once you learn the features it’s a much better camera than my GoPro
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gopro alternative
customer_reviews.text: It's a little cheaper, but the front screen makes a world of difference in day to day use. there's also quite a few add ons for it now that's been out for a year. It's my go-to b-roll tool now on set.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: action camera
customer_reviews.text: The frame of lens will be hot after using a while. battery life is less than an hour and half. in the summer time will easy to get over heat if you using long time under the sunshine with no wind.
customer_reviews.author: kehongjing

customer_reviews.title: bad product
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product because it is a waste of money. does not deserve the money you give. Very bad Product
customer_reviews.author: Rizvan

customer_reviews.title: Handy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little camera for getting action footage. Super smooth, and gets better audio than the GoPro! Try it out for yourself, but make sure that you don't touch the front after a long recording as it gets very hot!
customer_reviews.author: Trostle Films

customer_reviews.title: Open package and missing accessories
customer_reviews.text: I received my osmo today and I am missing accessories. The package is open and the screen protectors removed. It seems like it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best overall action camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this camera. I tested it right out of the box, and boy does this camera perform. Everything was so intuitive, so it was a breeze to setup. Took photage of a 2 hr. Hike with zero problems and the quality and stabilization were on par with the gopro 7. The front screen was so useful to frame my family and I in the shots, I really could not ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Adam a.

customer_reviews.title: with latest update it runs well
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this camera for hyper lapse feature that came out recently. That feature and dewarp works well. Also used for nighttime star lapses that come out satisfactory. very easy to use. i recommend using freewell filters too.
customer_reviews.author: Prestidigitation

customer_reviews.title: Awesome action camera
customer_reviews.text: Awesome action camera. I've been waiting to pull the trigger on this, but I finally did prior to a Maui vacation. The underwater video was very clear and stable. Slo-mo video was a big hit with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great action cam!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I would have given it a full five star rating, but the on screen menus are a little unintuitive to use unless you use them on a regular basis. Great little camera!
customer_reviews.author: William A. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Would buy w extra battery and mounts
customer_reviews.text: Great cam. Swiping menus good. Very few mounts given w unit. Buy extra battery. Bought DJI oem battery works well
customer_reviews.author: C M

customer_reviews.title: DJI do not miss it.
customer_reviews.text: I just got the camera. I like it immediately. Very well made. Do not forget to get a FAST micro SD card.
customer_reviews.author: LonReview

customer_reviews.title: Its a good product
customer_reviews.text: This works well and is at a great price point. i may be spoiled but i think DJI can make a better project. We will see in the next version
customer_reviews.author: Bubby

customer_reviews.title: Dual Display makes this action camera well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid GoPro user, I decided to try out the DJI based on reviews that it had superior stabilization. I found to love the dual displays on the camera. It made self video shoots a lot easier. It is also compatible with universal accessories that are used for GoPro. Haven't gotten around to using all the features, but so far Im loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 4K camera forever !
customer_reviews.text: Great camera , high quality , multifunctional, had both side screens with unique design ! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Rich John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. The timelapse works great, voice control is the only thing that doesn't work too well
customer_reviews.author: Christian Lemus

customer_reviews.text: This camera is great with only one caveat. It is very particular about what micro sd card you use. It requires a very fast card. If not fast enough it will not recognize it or stop recording.

product_meta.title: DJI Osmo Action - 4K Action Cam 12MP Digital Camera with 2 Displays 36ft Underwater Waterproof WiFi HDR Video 145° Angle, Black
product_meta.description: Unleash your other side with osmo action's dual screens and rock steady stabilization letting you capture it all.
feature_bullets: Dual Screens: Osmo Action’s dual screens allow you to capture it all with the touch of a button. A vivid front screen lets you frame yourself effortlessly in any setting, while the back screen delivers a crystal-clear, hyper-responsive display. This durable, versatile action camera is jam-packed with advanced technology that lets you spend less time worrying about equipment and more time living the action.
The RockSteady technology combines EIS with complex algorithms, delivering stable, shake-free footage no matter how heavy the action gets.
Action camera with 1/2.3" CMOS Sensor, 12MP, wide-angle 145° that allows you to shoot 4K HDR videos.

8x Slow Motion: Capture every epic move with jaw-dropping clarity and detail when you use 8x slow motion with 1080p resolution and 240fps. Time-lapse: Condense time and movement for stunning, easy-to-achieve results.
What you get: DJI Osmo Action, Camera Frame, Flat Adhesive Mount, Curved Adhesive Mount, Quick-Release Base, Battery, Battery Case, Locking Screw, USB-C Cable

11m Waterproof, -10℃ Temperature Resistant Sporting a watertight seal and a hydrophobic coating on the back touchscreen, Osmo Action is waterproof at depths of up to 11 meters, making it the perfect underwater companion. Versatile batteries perform well even in extremely cold environments with temperatures as low as -10℃.

DJI Mimo App requires iOS 10.0, Android 7.0 or above. Compatible devices include: iPhone 11 Pro Max, 11 Pro, 11, XS Max, XS, XR, X, 8 Plus, 8, 7 Plus, 7, 6s Plus, 6s, 6 Plus, 6, SE, Samsung Galaxy S10+, S10, S9+, S9 , S9+, S9, S8+, S7, S7 Edge, S6, S6 Edge, Note 8, Huawei P30 Pro, P30, P20, P10, Mate 10 Pro, Mate 10, Mate 9 Pro, Mate 9, Honor 10, Honor 9, Vivo NEX, Xiaomi Mi MIX 2S, Mi 8, Mi 6, OnePlus 7, 6T, 5, Pixel 3 XL, 2 XL, 2, Google Pixel 2 XL, Pixel 2
